Events.title: Data to Decisions: Powering Bharatâ€™s AI Revolution
Events.summary: A new initiative called "Data to Decisions" is powering India's AI revolution, particularly in the region of Bharat. The initiative is based in Bangalore, a major hub for technology and innovation in India. This effort aims to drive decision-making and growth through the use of artificial intelligence and data-driven insights.

AI Start-Up News.title: Bengaluru: ED alleges AI-led rigging at WinZO
AI Start-Up News.summary: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has alleged that WinZO, a gaming platform, engaged in AI-led rigging. The ED made this allegation in Bengaluru, highlighting potential unfair practices at the company. The accusation suggests that WinZO may have used artificial intelligence to manipulate game outcomes.
